name: Pakistan Institute for Parliamentary Services (Amendment) Act, 2020
tagline: To amend the Pakistan Institute for Parliamentary Services Act, 2008 for parliamentary training
content:
PART I]     THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., APRIL   8,  201 8 87 
 
 
 
 
ISLAMABAD,  WEDNESDAY , MARCH   4,  2020 
 
 
PART I  
 
Acts, Ordinances, President’s Orders and Regulations  
 
NATIONAL ASSEMBLY SE CRETARIAT  
 
Islamabad, the 2nd March , 2020 
 
  No. F. 23(171)/2019 -Legis .—The following Act of Majlis -e-Shoora  
(Parliament)  receiv ed the assent of the President on the 25 th February, 2020 is 
hereby pub lished for general information: — 
 
ACT NO. XIII  OF 2020 
 
AN 
 
ACT  
 
further to amend the Pakistan Institute for Parliamentary Services  
Act, 2008  
  
 WHEREAS  it is expedient further to amen d the Pakistan Institute for 
Parliamentary Services Act, 2008 (III of 2008) for the purposes hereinafter 
appearing ; 
 
(87) 
 
Price: Rs. 5.00 
 
[5249(2020)/Ex. Gaz.].   
88 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., MARCH   4,  2020 [PART I 
 
  It is hereby enacted a s follows: — 
 
 1. Short title and commencement. —(1) This Act shall be c alled the 
Pakistan Institute for Parliamentary Services (Amendment) Act, 2020.  
 
 (2) It shall come into force at once.  
 
 2. Amendment of section 4, Act III of 2008. —In the Pakistan 
Institute for Parliamentary Services Act, 2008 ( III of 2008), in section 4 , after 
clause (d), the following new clause (da) shall be inserted, namely: — 
 
 “(da) to provide for in -service trainings related to parliamentary  affairs, 
to the Federal Government’ s officials including the civil servants 
and such officials of the Provinc ial Governments, nominated by 
respective Governments and selected by the Establishment 
Division. ”. 
 
 
QAMAR SOHAIL LODHI , 
Acting Secretary .
